Topic.Title: Thug Battle | Online text-based mafia style game

Posts.EditableText:
Hey Everyone,

I own a game called www.thugbattle.com. It is a mafia/crime style text based game. I recently implemented features to help new players get started

The game is still in stages where you can have a chance to catch up. It will also be actively monitored and updated.

Post here your opinions, good or bad I am extremely receptive of criticism and encourage it.
